Question: Shenzhen Hua Xin Information Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Hua Xin Information Technology Co., Ltd.

Laser Navigation Robot Vacuum Cleaner

- Visual Localization for remembering position and planned routes
- Gyroscope Navigation Technology for S-shaped cleaning routes and real-time results through the app
- Offers SLAM Robotic Vacuum Cleaner, VSLAM Robotic Vacuum Cleaner, and Laser Robotic Vacuum Cleaner
- Global presence in over 30 countries and regions
- 36 invention and software copyright application technology patents
- Monthly production capacity of 70,000 to 250,000 units
- Strategic partnerships with top suppliers and ODM/OEM services
- Commitment to national artificial intelligence technology leadership and global market dominance
Summary_cn:
深圳市华信信息技术有限公司

激光导航扫地机器人

- 视觉定位记忆位置和规划路线
- 陀螺仪导航技术提供“S”形清洁路线和实时结果通过应用程序
- 提供 SLAM 扫地机器人、VSLAM 扫地机器人和激光扫地机器人
- 在30多个国家和地区具有全球覆盖范围
- 36项发明和软件版权申请技术专利
- 月产能7万至25万台
- 与顶级供应商建立战略合作伙伴关系和ODM/OEM服务
- 致力于国家人工智能技术领先地位和全球市场主导地位
